creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Knife with intricate incised geometric designs on lower part of handle and top of blade; ebony inlay and brass rings alternating with silver near top and bottom of handle; geometric designs on silver portions of sheath with green and red painted camel skin trim
medium: Silver, ebony, brass, camel skin, pigment
title: Ceremonial Knife and Sheath
